text: Knema intermedia is a species of plant in the family Myristicaceae. It is found in Sumatra, Peninsular Malaysia, Singapore, Java and Borneo. ==References== * de Wilde, W.J.J.O. 1998. Knema intermedia. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
